content: wrongside single_crochet 7 chain 2 turn total 7 row 2 rightside double_crochet in the same stitch tc 3 all in the next stitch double_crochet half_double_crochet in the next stitch sl st in the next stitch half_double_crochet double_crochet in the next stitch tc 3 all in the next stitch double_crochet in the next stitch chain 2 and slip_stitch it to the first single_crochet from row 1 chain turn total 13 row 3 ws half_double_crochet double_crochet over chain space double_crochet 2 in the next 5 stitches and slip_stitch to the slip_stitch from the previous round single_crochet 2 in the next 6 stitches slip_stitch to the first single_crochet of row 1 total 25 cut the yarn and weave the ends in hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the butterfly congratulations you finished the 21st ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 3 to go
